jktest.config module¶

This module contains the class that is the data store for required information to run the JKind Regression Test Suite.

class jktest.config.SetupConfig¶

Bases: object

Public Class

This class processes arguments and inputs required to run the JKind Regression Test Suite. It also acts as the data store from which modules may retrieve the processed and stored data.

Typically the “set” methods accept inputs from the command line arguments or the GUI. However if alternate applications are derived there are no restrictions on how or when to access this class.

This class implements the Borg Design Pattern. This DP is similar to a Singleton, except that it is explicitly instantiated and contains shared data. Each instantiation is a unique object but all objects share the internal __dict__ and thus all share the data.

Constructor

Sets the shared state per the Borg Design Pattern.

_walk(root='.', recurse=True, pattern='*')¶

Private Method

Generator for walking a directory tree. Starts at specified root folder, returning files that match our pattern. Optionally will also recurse through sub-folders.

Parameters:
  • root (str) – the top folder path to walk through
  • recurse (bool) – if True will go through sub-folders
  • pattern (str) – file extension to look for (i.e. *.c, *.py)
Yield:

path+filename
Ytype:

str

getJarFile()¶

Public Method

Getter method to retrieve the path to the specified alternate JKind jar file to run. If an alternate jar was not specified via the complementary set method, will return None.

Returns:Fully qualified path if set, None otherwise.
Return type:str or None

Public Method

Returns the log file path and filename. Initialized to None.

Returns:Filename if set, otherwise None
Return type:str or None

Public Method

Returns a deep-copy of the list of all the possible argument combinations.

Returns:List of argument strings if initialized, otherwise None
Return type:list[str...] or None

Public Method

Returns a deep-copy of the list of all the files to test.

setJarFile(path)¶

Public Method

Set the fully qualified path of the desired alternate JKind jar file. If not explicitly set the application will use the default JKind that is on the system path.

Parameters:path (str) – Fully qualified path to alternate JKind jar file
Returns:n/a:
setLogFile(fname)¶

Public Method

Sets the log file. No error checking on type of if the path exists.

Parameters:fname (str) – path and filename of the log file
Returns:n/a:
setTestArguments(argumentsXmlFile)¶

Public Method

Reads the Arguments XML file and collects all of the Argument Group elements. Creates all the possible combinations of argument strings between the items in each of the Argument Groups.

Parameters:argumentsXmlFile (str) – path and filename of the XML Argument File
Returns:n/a:
Asserts:argumentsXmlFile file exists
setTestFiles(fileOrPath, recurse)¶

Public Method

Stores the filenames to test. Accepts either a single filename, a list of filenames or a folder to search for Lustre files.

Parameters:
  • fileOrPath (str or list of str’s) – filename(s) or path
  • recurse (bool) – If folder specified, flag to recursively search sub-folders
Returns:

n/a:
Asserts:
  • If list is supplied, list length > 0
  • File(s) or folder path exists
